metadata.title: CVE-2018-1041 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in the way RemoteMessageChannel, introduced injboss-remoting versions 3.3.10, reads from an empty buffer. An attackercould use this flaw to cause denial of service via high CPU caused by aninfinite loop.

criterions.comment: libjboss-remoting-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
